amendment.description: To authorize the waiver of certain grounds of inadmissibility or removal where denial of admission or removal would result in hardship for a spouse, parent, or child who is a citizen or permanent resident alien.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 4142 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 63 - 34. Record Vote Number: 142.

Amendment SA 4142 proposed by Senator Durbin. (consideration: CR S4948-4950, S4954-4955; text: CR S4948-4949) To authorize the waiver of certain grounds of inadmissibility or removal where denial of admission or removal would result in hardship for a spouse, parent, or child who is a citizen or permanent resident alien.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4142 proposed by Senator Durbin.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 4142 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 63 - 34. Record Vote Number: 142.
